description: This file implements serialization utilities for string conversions, hex encoding/decoding, base64 encoding, and UTF-16 encoding/decoding within the WPEFramework Core namespace. It provides functions for converting between wide and narrow strings, hex strings, base64 strings, and UTF-16 code points, along with handling special string escaping.

methods.name: string ToString(const char realString[],unsigned int length)
methods.description: Converts wchar_t array to std::string and char array to std::wstring with platform-specific handling.

methods.name: void EXTERNAL ToHexString(const uint8_t object[],const uint16_t length,string & result)
methods.description: Converts a byte array to its hexadecimal string representation, handling special escape sequences.

methods.name: uint16_t EXTERNAL FromHexString(const string & hexString,uint8_t * object,const uint16_t maxLength)
methods.description: Converts a hexadecimal string back into a byte array, supporting an optional length limit.

methods.name: string ToString(const wchar_t realString[],unsigned int length)
methods.description: Encodes a byte array into a base64 string, with optional padding.

methods.name: uint16_t FromString(const string & newValue,uint8_t object[],uint16_t & length,const TCHAR * ignoreList)
methods.description: Decodes a base64 string into a byte array, ignoring specified characters.

methods.name: bool CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t codePoint,uint16_t & lowPart,uint16_t & highPart)
methods.description: Encodes a Unicode code point into UTF-16 surrogate pairs if necessary.

methods.name: bool UTF16ToCodePoint(const uint16_t lowPart,const uint16_t highPart,uint32_t & codePoint)
methods.description: Decodes UTF-16 surrogate pairs into a Unicode code point.

methods.name: int8_t ToCodePoint(const TCHAR * data,const uint8_t length,uint32_t & codePoint)
methods.description: Converts a UTF-8 sequence to a Unicode code point.

methods.name: int8_t FromCodePoint(uint32_t codePoint,TCHAR * data,const uint8_t length)
methods.description: Converts a Unicode code point into a UTF-8 sequence.

methods.name: string EXTERNAL ToQuotedString(const TCHAR quote,const string & input)
methods.description: Escapes internal quote characters within a string and surrounds it with quote characters.

methods.name: void ToString(const uint8_t object[],const uint16_t length,const bool padding,string & result)

ctags.name: CodePointToUTF16
ctags.pattern: /^    bool CodePointToUTF16(const uint32_t codePoint, uint16_t& lowPart, uint16_t& highPart) {$/

ctags.name: FromCodePoint
ctags.pattern: /^    int8_t FromCodePoint(uint32_t codePoint, TCHAR* data, const uint8_t length) {$/

ctags.name: FromHexString
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t EXTERNAL FromHexString(const string& hexString, uint8_t* object, const uint16_t max/

ctags.name: FromString
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t FromString(const string& newValue, uint8_t object[], uint16_t& length, const TCHAR*/
ctags.signature: (const string & newValue,uint8_t object[],uint16_t & length,const TCHAR * ignoreList)

ctags.name: ToCodePoint
ctags.pattern: /^    int8_t ToCodePoint(const TCHAR* data, const uint8_t length,  uint32_t& codePoint) {$/

ctags.pattern: /^    void EXTERNAL ToHexString(const uint8_t object[], const uint16_t length, string& result)$/

ctags.pattern: /^    string EXTERNAL ToQuotedString(const TCHAR quote, const string& input) {$/

ctags.pattern: /^    string ToString(const char realString[], unsigned int length)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    string ToString(const wchar_t realString[], unsigned int length)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    void ToString(const char realString[], std::wstring& result)$/

ctags.name: ToString
ctags.pattern: /^    void ToString(const uint8_t object[], const uint16_t length, const bool padding, string& res/
